title: Language switching on mac
body: I am using MAC with the latest client on jp server and I want to switch language form Japanese to English. Ive tried to change client settings file and locate file, but it doesn't work. So how do I change it? Thanks!

replies.body:
When you start to sign in on the client, there should be a box under the password section with your language choices. 

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/article_attachments/115008287567/changing-game-language-client-landing.jpg

There is only one language (for me japanese) how do I get it so that English is also there? 

(MAC user)
